snippet: The police said that a man had killed at least one person inside a home and was holding children hostage.
abstract: Standoff between armed man and dozens of police officers at house in Trenton, NJ, continues into second day amid reports man has killed at least one person inside the home and is holding children hostage.
lead_paragraph: The police said that a man had killed at least one person inside a home and was holding children hostage.
